alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:25PM CST until January 03 at 11:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN NOXUBEE...SOUTHEASTERN OKTIBBEHA AND EASTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 1024 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Louisville, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Millcreek around 1030 PM CST. Betheden around 1035 PM CST. Oktoc around 1050 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Noxapater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
